translations: v．促进，推动：帮助某事物发展或取得进展。
· He is furthering his education by taking online courses.
他通过参加在线课程来进一步提高自己的教育水平。

phrs.translation: 进一步研究；深造；继续教育，进修
进一步信息；更多的信息；补充信息
进一步做；进一步说；更多地给
延伸阅读；补充书目；进一步的阅读

sentences.sentence: Education needn't only be about furthering your career.
sentences.translation: 教育不必只是与推进你的事业有关。

sentences.sentence: The two sides will maintain close contact and cooperation on furthering this initiative.
sentences.translation: 双方将为此保持密切联系和合作。

sentences.sentence: Having completed my B.C. degree, I didn’t have any intentions of furthering my education.
sentences.translation: 在完成了理工科学士学位后，我没有进行深造学习。
